section.title: Reporting CPU Sockets
section.para: &PRODUCT; manages different types of hosts that contains one or more physical CPU sockets. CPU socket is considered as a unit of measure used for licensing and billing cloud infrastructure. &PRODUCT; provides both UI and API support to collect the CPU socket statistics for billing purpose. The Infrastructure tab has a new tab for CPU sockets. You can view the statistics for CPU sockets managed by &PRODUCT;, which in turn reflects the size of the cloud. The CPU Socket page will give you the number of hosts and sockets used for each host type.

listitem.para: In the left navigation bar, click Infrastructure.
On CPU Sockets, click View all.
The CPU Socket page is displayed. The page shows the number of hosts and CPU sockets based on hypervisor types.
